an7.29:4.3: Bhikkhudassanaṃ hāpeti, saddhammassavanaṃ pamajjati, adhisīle na sikkhati, appasādabahulo hoti, bhikkhūsu theresu ceva navesu ca majjhimesu ca upārambhacitto dhammaṃ suṇāti randhagavesī, ito bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ gavesati, tattha ca pubbakāraṃ karoti.
an7.29:4.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta dhammā upāsakassa parihānāya saṃvattanti.
an7.29:5.1: Sattime, bhikkhave, dhammā upāsakassa aparihānāya saṃvattanti.
an7.29:5.3: Bhikkhudassanaṃ na hāpeti, saddhammassavanaṃ nappamajjati, adhisīle sikkhati, pasādabahulo hoti, bhikkhūsu theresu ceva navesu ca majjhimesu ca anupārambhacitto dhammaṃ suṇāti na randhagavesī, na ito bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ gavesati, idha ca pubbakāraṃ karoti.
an7.29:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta dhammā upāsakassa aparihānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
an7.29:5.6: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
